section.name: Introduction
section.p:
The lifecycle demo shows only the calling of the Avalon lifecycle methods under Loom control. If you are not familiar with the Avalon lifecycle, please refer to the
Avalon lifecycle documentation.
Do not forget that the lifecycle methods are optional. You can implement all of them, as this demo does, some or none of them.
